      • sendRequest

        java.lang.String sendRequest(java.lang.String message,
                             java.lang.String params,
                             java.lang.String from,
                             java.lang.String to,
                             java.lang.String type,
                             java.lang.String target)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a new Requester for Request/Respond.
        Parameters:
        message - type of the Request.
        params - optional parameter, e.g. the name of the device for an getDeviceData-Request.
        from - sender of the message.
        to - receiver of the message.
        type - type of the message to put in queue, mostly "request".
        target - queue to put the message in.
        Returns:
        returns the
        Throws:
        java.lang.String - with the respond.
        java.lang.Exception

      • sendResponse

        void sendResponse(java.lang.String message,
                  java.lang.String params,
                  java.lang.String from,
                  java.lang.String to,
                  java.lang.String type,
                  java.lang.String correlId,
                  java.lang.String target)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Sends the respond to a related request.
        Parameters:
        message - content of the response.
        params - optional parameters for the response.
        from - sender of the response.
        to - receiver of the response.
        type - type of the message, in this case "response"
        correlId - correlated ID to assign the response to the right request.
        target - queue to put the response in.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • sendPublish

        void sendPublish(java.lang.String message,
                 java.lang.String params,
                 java.lang.String from,
                 java.lang.String to,
                 java.lang.String type,
                 java.lang.String target)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Sends a publish message.
        Parameters:
        message - content of the message.
        params - optional parameters.
        from - sender of the publish message.
        to - receiver of the publish message.
        type - type of the message, in this case "publish"
        target - queue to put the message in.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        Creates a consumer to receive message at the corresponding queue.

        threadExecutor - threadexecutor that handles the worker.
        chan - channel where the queue is.
        queue - name of the queue to observe.

      • getDeviceData

        java.lang.String getDeviceData(java.lang.String device,
                               java.lang.String requester)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Get the data of a device.
        Parameters:
        device - targeted device, has to be like "name#dataid@targetserver".
        requester - origin of the request, has to be like "requestername@requesterserver".
        Returns:
        String of the data.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • subscribeDeviceData

        public java.lang.String subscribeDeviceData(java.lang.String device,
                                            java.lang.String requester)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Subscribe device data.
        Parameters:
        device - targeted device, has to be like "name#dataid@targetserver".
        requester - origin of the request, has to be like "requestername@requesterserver".
        Returns:
        String with the respond to the subscribe request.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • unsubscribeDeviceData

        public java.lang.String unsubscribeDeviceData(java.lang.String device,
                                              java.lang.String requester)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Unsubscribe device data.
        Parameters:
        device - targeted device, has to be like "name#dataid@targetserver".
        requester - origin of the request, has to be like "requestername@requesterserver".
        Returns:
        String with the respond to the subscribe request.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • addServiceAccess

        public void addServiceAccess(User user,
                             java.lang.String service,
                             int... dataIndex)
        Set service access to on or more device datas.
        Parameters:
        user - user of the device.
        service - servicename to allow access.
        dataIndex - one ore more data indexes.

      • removeServiceAccess

        public void removeServiceAccess(User user,
                                java.lang.String service,
                                int... dataIndex)
        Remove the access to on or more device datas.
        Parameters:
        user - owner of the device.
        service - servicename to allow access.
        dataIndex - one ore more data indexes.

      • discoverFollowers

        protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> discoverFollowers(User user)
        Get a HashMap of all services that currently subscribe device data.
        Parameters:
        user - owner of the device.
        Returns:
        HashMap with data index and current subscribers.
